body_content.explanation: unsuccessful or showing no activity or development:
examples: Her career was in the doldrums during those years.

body_content.explanation: a period of being sad or bored and with no energy or enthusiasm:
examples: I don't know why but I'm in the doldrums today.
There's a new cinematic release this week, just in time to rescue us from the winter doldrums.
Don't let the post-holiday doldrums ruin your spirits!
She got a new puppy and that lifted her right out of the doldrums.
He just can't handle the doldrums of having an unexciting office job - he wants fame and glamour.
